Title: Kumar Kartikey Agarwal | Personal Webpage
Name: Kumar Kartikey Agarwal
Description: I am third year undergraduate at Indian Institute of Technology Ropar.
I grab every chance I get to travel, learn and create.
AboutContent: I’m a Chemical Engineering major by day, a Badminton player by evening.
If you can’t find me, it’s because I’m already playing, travelling, or studying for an exam
I am passionate about Technology and Android Development.
I love the way the concept of "work" has evolved over the past decades, and hence would love to travel and work together whenever I can.
WorkContent: I am currently undergraduate at IIT Ropar majoring in Chemical Engineering.
